entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pond Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -29.1°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. Temperature falling to minus 34 this afternoon.
